dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Sense of Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin react to humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will respond with sarcasm or a completely serious tone, often making witty remarks.
Your FarTwin will laugh loudly and enthusiastically, enjoying silly jokes and playful teasing.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems with a systematic and analytical mind, seeking data-driven solutions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creativity to find innovative solutions, often thinking outside the box.

dimensions.label: Interest in Learning
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be eager to learn and explore new topics, devouring books and seeking out experiences.
Your FarTwin will approach learning with a lack of enthusiasm, seeing it as a necessary task rather than a passion.

dimensions.label: Technology Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly comfortable using digital tools and devices, often preferring them over traditional methods.
Your FarTwin will avoid technology whenever possible, seeing it as a threat to personal relationships or productivity.

dimensions.label: Work Ethic
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their career?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for success and recognition, often taking calculated risks to advance in their field.
Your FarTwin will approach work with a laid-back attitude, prioritizing job security over ambition or prestige.

dimensions.label: Social Connections
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build and maintain relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be a people person, seeking out new friendships and connections with ease.
Your FarTwin will prefer to maintain a smaller social circle, valuing alone time and meaningful relationships over large groups.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their finances?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and investing, seeking to maximize their wealth and security.
Your FarTwin will have a more liberal attitude towards spending, enjoying the finer things in life and taking calculated risks for financial gain.
